name: Colourshift
description:
A simple, relaxing hue-matching game in less than 1.6k, inspired by games like I Love Hue.

Tap two colours to swap them; arrange the grid in order of hue and brightness to advance to the next level.

Best played on http://dhmstark.co.uk/games/2kplus/colourshift/ because itch.io mangles the encoding and doesn't autodetect viewport size.
